means: 大黄蜂( hornet的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Laws catch flies, but let hornets go free.
sentence.Network_cn: 法律如蛛网,捉得住苍蝇, 捉不住黄蜂.

sentence.Network_en: The hornets are the worst -- they often lurk outside the hives to rob the bees. "
sentence.Network_cn: 你得提防虫子爬进来,还得提防大黄蜂.大黄蜂这贼最恶, 常常落在蜜蜂窝洞口. 专干坏事. ”

entry.def: A hornet is a large wasp. Hornets live in nests and have a powerful sting.

entry.tran: 一大堆麻烦;棘手的局面;马蜂窝
entry.def: If you say that someone has stirred up a hornet's nest, you mean that they have done something which has caused a lot of argument or trouble.

auth_sentence.content: There are fewer wasps, hornets, and bumblebees as well.
